newsitem.title: USA: Columbia/HCA, Medline enter homecare pact.
newsitem.headline: Columbia/HCA, Medline enter homecare pact.

text.p: Columbia Homecare Group, the home health division of healthcare provider Columbia/HCA Healthcare Corp, said Thursday it had selected Medline Industries Inc as provider of medical and surgical products.
Mundelein, Ill.-based Medline, under the $30 million, three-year agreement, will ship orders directly to a patient's home or to a Columbia Homecare agency in patient-specific packages.
Columbia Homecare operates more than 550 agencies and will provide more than 18 million home health visits in 31 states in 1997.
